channel.title: Adding commands

item.title: Adding commands
item.dc:creator: @Jessekinss Jessekinss
item.description:
@Jessekinss wrote:

Ok well first, I don’t understand what you’re trying to accomplish.

if(command.startsWith(“tz”)){
sM(""+KilledTz+"");
}

That makes no sense.

And this one;

if(command.startsWith(“prayer”) && playerRights > 1){
sM(“Attack: “+AtkPray+””);
sM(“Strength: “+StrPrayer+””);
sM(“Defence: “+DefPray+””);
sM(“Range: “+RangePray+””);
sM(“Magic: “+MagePray+””);
}

It’ll send you a message of your stats? Pointless?

And wow, this one? Seriously? And you’re wondering why it doesn’t work?

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“train”)) {
toX = 3333;
toY = 3333;
}

Second, are you a moderator(2) or administrator(3) or perhaps an undercover moderator(4)?

Third, wrong section. It clearly states RSC Server Emulation.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding commands
item.dc:creator: @tonyjacobs tonyjacobs
item.description:
@tonyjacobs wrote:

yo i have added commands, i put them in the customstring voids like this
private void customCommand(String command) {
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“train”)) {
toX = 3333;
toY = 3333;
}
if(command.startsWith(“newitem”) && playerRights > 0){
sM(“Items refreshed!”);
server.itemHandler = new ItemHandler();
}
if(command.startsWith(“tz”)){
sM(""+KilledTz+"");
}
if(command.startsWith(“prayer”) && playerRights > 1){
sM(“Attack: “+AtkPray+””);
sM(“Strength: “+StrPrayer+””);
sM(“Defence: “+DefPray+””);
sM(“Range: “+RangePray+””);
sM(“Magic: “+MagePray+””);
}
if(command.startsWith(“book”) && playerRights > 1){
setSidebarInterface(6, 18787);

and i save compile then run and it doesnt work can someone tell me what im doing wrong[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 30, 2009, 05:55:41 pm[/size][hr]need help bad on this
